title: Pixel 3a XL
content:
I got my uncle a pixel 3a XL last year and he pass 3 months later, the family sent me a few of his things including his pixel 3a phone and it is locked asking for a passcode with none of the family knows. Anything that can be done with resetting it,given i have tried all things that i googled with no luck?

I also contacted Google support and they are no help, i would hate to have to throw it away!
